title: Classic Double Cheeseburger with Fries
instructions: Slice onions thinly and cook crinkle cut fries in peanut oil.
Toast sesame seeded burger bun and cook 80/20 ground beef patties with yellow American cheese and onions.

Make potato buns by combining bread flour, potato flour, sugar, yeast, salt, water, milk, eggs, and butter, knead, let rise, shape into buns, let rise again, brush with egg wash, sprinkle with sesame seeds, and bake.
Make American cheese by blending shredded cheeses with milk and sodium citrate, chilling until set, and slicing.
Prepare crinkle cut fries by cutting and soaking potatoes, blanching, freezing, frying twice, and seasoning with salt.
Grind short rib, brisket, and chuck roast into burger blend, form patties, and cook on a flat top.
Assemble the burgers with the homemade buns, American cheese, and toppings.
